description.@en: With every stomp, a loud ‘CRUNCH!’ rumbles from below.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you conjure forth a massive yet invisible jackboot, taking shape only when you stomp the ground. All those caught in a Burst Template suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage. They can attempt to Dodge by Resisting with a successful Coordination Test to avoid the Damage. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but foes are always left Prone instead.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe is also Knocked Out if they fail to Dodge.

criticalFailure.@en: A hideous cacophony of laughter and snickering rings out. You must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or else be made Prone.

reagents.@en: Your boots drenched in blood, stomped on the ground
